page.title: 07AMERICAN SCHOOLS.
page.content: {EDUCATION The American school has 2 locations the primary school in Milltimber and the secondary school in Cults.Both schools were established in 1972 to cater for American children whose families had moved to this area beca- use of the oil boom in the North Sea. For the first 7 years the schools were badly run and had an extremely bad reputation.Because of this the school role decreased dramatically.A closure was threatened in 1979 and so the schools were bought by several oil companies. {PRIMARY SCHOOL Today approximately 165 pupils attend the elementary school,many of whom only stay a few months at a time. The average length of attendance is 2 years.The age range of the pupils,most of whom are American,is 6-11.
